attributes.action: authorise the painting of all road bridges in rainbow colours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rainbow bridges will help to make driving more interesting, hopefully reduce accidents and add a little cheer to otherwise monotonous journeys. Slogans could also be added to create inspiration and generate ideas during the driving experience.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
